title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When using Build 200201151 and performing a search for references to a field, the search results are not being selected in an external jar. This issue can be reproduced by following the steps below.
OB: After performing the search, double-click on a search result. Observe that the first match is not being selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be selected as expected.
SR:
1. Open the application with Build 200201151.
2. Perform a search for references to a specific field.
3. Double-click on a search result.
4. Observe that the first match is not being selected.
